TITLE: 14 Things Every Woman Should Know By The Time She Turns 40
SUMMARY: The wisdom of Gen X women.

TITLE: I Tried Out for ‘The Bachelor’ 3 Times And This Is What I Learned
SUMMARY: I was feeling desperate and when you’re feeling desperate, you do nonsensical and illogical things.

TITLE: I Went Into Treatment For Body Dysmorphic Disorder. This Is What It’s Like.
SUMMARY: I couldn’t go more than 15 minutes without checking my reflection — without, in BDD/OCD terms, ritualizing.

TITLE: I’m American, But You Might Never Know It By Looking At My Life. That’s The Point.
SUMMARY: I possess a Taiwanese birth certificate, a U.S. passport, a German marriage certificate and a Swiss permanent residency card.

TITLE: What It’s Like To Be A ‘Highly Sensitive Person’ When You’re A Man
SUMMARY: Men are taught from a young age that our worth is in our strength — both physical and emotional.
